channel.title: Community on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Community on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Releases
item.description: Open Cluster Management has approximately a three to four month release cycle. The current release is v0.9.0. Continue reading to view upcoming releases: v0.9.0, 21st, October 2022 Open Cluster Management team is proud to announce the release of OCM v0.9.0! Here are some main features included in this release: De-escalate Work Agent Privilege on Managed Clusters In previous iterations of OCM, the Work Agent process is run with admin privileges on managed clusters.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: The Open Cluster Management community uses GitHub Project to track the progress of the project.
